verses.verse: Now while <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> and made <S%H3034>confession,<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> and casting himself <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> there was <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together to him out of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%> and <S%H3206>children;<s%> for the <S%H582>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H7235>very<s%> <S%H1059>bitterly.<s%>

<S%H7935>Shecaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> one of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H5830>Ezra,<s%> <S%H559>"We<s%> have <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against our <S%H430>God,<s%> and have <S%H3427>married<s%> <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Yet now there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H4723>hope<s%> for Israel concerning this <S%H3478>thing.<s%>

Now therefore let us <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with our <S%H430>God<s%> to put <S%H3318>away<s%> all the <S%H802>wives,<s%> and such as are <S%H3205>born<s%> of <S%H6098>them,<s%> according to the counsel of my <S%H136>lord,<s%> and of those who <S%H2730>tremble<s%> at the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%> Let it be <S%H6213>done<s%> according to the <S%H8451>law.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise;<s%> for the <S%H1697>matter<s%> belongs to <S%H2388>you,<s%> and we are with you. Be courageous, and do <S%H6213>it.<s%>"

Then <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and made the <S%H8269>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> that they would <S%H6213>do<s%> according to this <S%H1697>word.<s%> So they <S%H7650>swore.<s%>

Then <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> into the <S%H3957>room<s%> of <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib:<s%> and when he <S%H3212>came<s%> <S%H398>there,<s%> he ate no <S%H3899>bread,<s%> nor <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> for he <S%H56>mourned<s%> because of their <S%H4604>trespass<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity.<s%>

They made <S%H5674>proclamation<s%> throughout <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> that they should gather themselves <S%H6908>together<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

and that whoever <S%H935>didn't<s%> come within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> according to the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> all his <S%H7399>substance<s%> should be <S%H2763>forfeited,<s%> and himself <S%H914>separated<s%> from the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity.<s%>

Then all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6908>together<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> within the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> it was the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month:<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H7339>broad<s%> place before the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7460>trembling<s%> because of this <S%H1697>matter,<s%> and for the great <S%H1653>rain.<s%>

<S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> stood <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4603>them,<s%> "You have trespassed, and have <S%H3427>married<s%> <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> to <S%H3254>increase<s%> the <S%H819>guilt<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H8426>confession<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H7522>pleasure;<s%> and <S%H914>separate<s%> yourselves from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and from the <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women.<s%>"
Then all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>with<s%> a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> "As you have <S%H559>said<s%> concerning <S%H6213>us,<s%> so must we do.

<S%H61>But<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7227>many,<s%> and it is a <S%H6256>time<s%> of much <S%H1653>rain,<s%> and we are not <S%H3581>able<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H2351>outside;<s%> neither is this a <S%H4399>work<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> or <S%H8147>two;<s%> for <S%H7235>we<s%> have greatly <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> in this <S%H1697>matter.<s%>

Let now our <S%H8269>princes<s%> be <S%H5975>appointed<s%> for all the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> and let all those who are in our <S%H5892>cities<s%> who have <S%H3427>married<s%> <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> at <S%H2163>appointed<s%> <S%H6256>times,<s%> and with them the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of every <S%H5892>city,<s%> and its <S%H8199>judges,<s%> until the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H7725>turned<s%> from <S%H1697>us,<s%> until this matter is resolved."

Only <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> and <S%H3167>Jahzeiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8616>Tikvah<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> up against <S%H4918>this;<s%> and Meshullam and <S%H7678>Shabbethai<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> helped <S%H5826>them.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> did <S%H6213>so.<s%> <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> with <S%H582>certain<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1>households,<s%> after their fathers' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and all of them by their <S%H8034>names,<s%> were set <S%H914>apart;<s%> and they sat <S%H3427>down<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> to <S%H1875>examine<s%> the <S%H1697>matter.<s%>

They made an <S%H3615>end<s%> with all the <S%H582>men<s%> who had <S%H3427>married<s%> <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> by the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

Among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> there were <S%H4672>found<s%> who had <S%H3427>married<s%> <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women:<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3136>Jozadak,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> and <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> and <S%H3402>Jarib,<s%> and <S%H1436>Gedaliah.<s%>

They <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> that they would put <S%H3318>away<s%> their <S%H802>wives;<s%> and being <S%H818>guilty,<s%> they offered a <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> for their <S%H819>guilt.<s%>
